column3: 0.9 for want of elaboration or specificity
column4: 0.9 for want of elaboration or specificity
column5: 0.85 for want of elaboration or specificity
column6: 0.85 for want of elaboration or specificity
column7: 0.9 for addressing issues and describing potential solutions; else 0.8 for addressing privacy or security issues without addressing solutions
column8: 0.9 for hardware/software compatibility questions; else 0.9 for discussion of software and other topics mixed-in; 0.8 for needing to name specific hardware; else 0.8 for saying no new hardware if at least one server would likely be needed; else 0.6 for defining hardware and giving examples of hardware, though not clearly within the system context
column9: 0.9 for hardware/software compatibility questions; else 0.6 for defining hardware and giving examples of software, though not clearly within the system context
column10: 0.9 for discussion of networks and also discussion intended to be about networks but is about other/general issues; 0.8 for mentioning the word internet and also discussion intended to be about networks but is about other/general issues; else 0.5 for want of specificity
column11: 0.8 for mostly table or query screenshots but also a screenshot of a form OR a report; else 0.6 for table or query screenshots without broader context, a form, or a report
column12: 1 for proper entities, relationships, and cardinality notations even if some optionalities remain unaddressed or unjustified; else 0.9 for at least one primary key issue; 0.8 for minor relationship or entity errors; 0.8 for significant primary key or foreign key issues; else 0.8 for acceptable but suboptimal design due to assumption issues; else 0.7 for significant cardinality, entity, and relationship issues;
column13: 0.8 for entity descriptions but not all attribute descriptions; 0.6 for a written description which needs elaboration; 0.2 for illegible or non-relevant or in a file which can't be opened
column14: .75 for want of additional queries, or for errors and/or questionable query constructs
